shard_effect.description: Successful Counterspell creates an illusion attacking the caster for 5 seconds. Removes Counterspell manacost.

scepter_effect.description: Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor by 7 and grants Axe 7 armor per affected targeted.

shard_effect.description: Causes Axe's attacks to have a chance to proc a Counter Helix. Attack procs ignore Counter Helix cooldown. Increases attack speed by 35.

scepter_effect.description: Decreases cooldown and makes Brain Sap pierce Spell Immunity.

shard_effect.description: Fiend's Grip now creates an uncontrollable illusion that is also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusion takes incoming damage and immediately dies if they are interrupted.

scepter_effect.description: Grants 2 charges to Rupture with a 40 seconds replenish time.

shard_effect.description: Bloodrage attacks now deal 2% of the target's max health as pure damage and heals Bloodseeker for that amount. Only works for Bloodseeker.

scepter_effect.description: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over a set amount of time.

shard_effect.description: Frostbite can be cast on yourself, reducing incoming damage by 70% for the duration. She is unable to move or attack during that time. Allows casting Frostbite while channeling as long as the target is within range. Reduces cooldown by 1.

scepter_effect.description: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.

shard_effect.description: Frost Arrows now apply Hypothermia stack to enemy heroes, reducing their regeneration by 10% per stack. Increases damage by 5 per stack. Lasts 7 seconds. If an enemy hero dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal 60 magic damage per stack and 25% slow for 2 seconds to enemies within 650 radius. Max Stacks: 7

scepter_effect.description: Enchant Totem becomes a 1100 range ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there. Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping.

shard_effect.description: Reduces Fissure cooldown by 2 seconds and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts an ability, an aftershock is released along its path.
Increases movement speed during Blade Fury by 100 and attacks a random nearby unit once per second dealing damage.

scepter_effect.description: Causes Sacred Arrow to release Starstorm projectiles of the current onto enemies within 500 range of it as it travels. Releases an extra meteorite for the enemy hit by the arrow.

shard_effect.description: Grants +1 Leap Charge. Leap buff grants Mirana 1.5x Critical Strike attacks for its duration.

scepter_effect.description: Increases Necromastery Max Souls and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.

notes.title: Damage & Heal per Line on Return

shard_effect.description: Necromastery provides 0.75% Spell Amp per soul.

scepter_effect.description: Allows targeting allied heroes. While Morphed, you gain Cast Range increase.

shard_effect.description: Causes Adaptive Strike to have +1 Multishot and removes the 3 second shared cooldown between the two different abilities. Prioritizes heroes.

scepter_effect.description: Can be cast to destroy all currently active Juxtapose illusions, and then quickly creates the max amount of illusions around Phantom Lancer with an increased duration.

shard_effect.description: Increases Spirit Lance illusion damage dealt by 20% and causes the projectile to bounce to another unit within 900 radius, prioritizing heroes.

scepter_effect.description: Increases damage from coil breaks, increases coil duration, coil break stun goes through spell immunity.

shard_effect.description: Waning Rift now deals 70 bonus damage and knocks enemies back 250 distance over 0.4 seconds (non-interrupting). Reveals invisible enemy units and wards in the area for 5 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Increases Rot radius by 200, damage per second by 80, and causes it to reduce enemy health restoration by 25%.

shard_effect.description: Allows  Dismember to be cast on an allied hero, swallowing them. While swallowed, the ally is invulnerable and hidden, and gets 6% of their max health regenerated per second. Grants Pudge the Eject sub-ability. Has halved cooldown when cast on allies.

scepter_effect.description: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

shard_effect.description: Causes Storm Surge to have a 18% chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release a forked lightning that strikes the target and up to 2 other enemies. Deals 120 damage and slows them by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit by your Burrowstrike and increases its cast range. Does not apply Caustic Finale to illusions.

shard_effect.description: Every 700 units moved causes an Epicenter Pulse around Sand King in 400 AoE.

scepter_effect.description: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.
Increases cast range and transports Sven along the storm hammer.

shard_effect.description: Storm Hammer now applies a dispel on enemies.

scepter_effect.description: Causes Vengeance Aura to create a strong illusion of Vengeful Spirit upon dying, that can cast her abilities, deals and takes 100% damage, and moves 30% faster. Continuously moves Vengeful Spirit around with the illusion while she is dead, and allows hero to still gain experience while dead, as long as the illusion is alive. If the illusion is alive as she respawns, she takes the illusion's place.

shard_effect.description: Wave of Terror steals 25% of enemy hero base damage and grants it to Vengeful Spirit for the debuff duration.

scepter_effect.description: Grants 2 charges to Windrun, increases movement speed, and removes movement speed limit

shard_effect.description: Powershot now becomes global, but only hits heroes beyond its default range (max 1 hero). Impacted heroes will be killed if they are under 13% after taking the impact damage (scales based on Powershot channel).

Static Field can be cast to perform a Heavenly Jump, shocking the closest visible enemy (prioritizing heroes) within 2000 range, dealing Static Field damage to them and reducing their movement speed by 100% for 2.5 seconds. If Zeus is moving forward, he will jump towards that direction. Cooldown: 14. Manacost: 100.

scepter_effect.description: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.

shard_effect.description: Increases Laguna Blade's cast range by 150 and causes it to go the full cast length and hit all units along the way. Can be ground targeted.

scepter_effect.description: Casts Sinister Gaze in a target area.
Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.

shard_effect.description: Causes Mana Drain grants true sight over the enemy and reduces their attack speed by 120.
Shackles creates Serpent Wards attacking the target. Increases Shackles cast range by 150. Lasts 7 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Whenever Slardar casts Slithereen Crush, he creates a puddle of water that is considered a river for movement and bonuses. Provides additional HP Regen, Armor and Status Resistance while in a puddle or in the river.

shard_effect.description: Slithereen Crush icon.pngCauses Corrosive Haze to be applied for 5 seconds to units hit with Slithereen Crush.

scepter_effect.description: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line. Decreases cooldown.

shard_effect.description: Increases Anchor Smash damage by 90 and causes it to affect buildings. Reduces cooldown by 1 second.

scepter_effect.description: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.
Increases duration, attacks, cast range and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.
Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.

shard_effect.description: Black Hole does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a 1200 AoE. Pulls at a rate of 175.

scepter_effect.description: Increases  Laser cast range by 400, causes it to reduce the target's current health and model size by 20% (stacking), and makes it bounce to the furthest enemy within 700 radius of the primary target, prioritizing heroes.
Causes Assassinate to fire quicker and disable the enemy target.
Reduces Ghost Shroud cooldown to 10 seconds
Calls 2 golems with reduced stats and bounty.

shard_effect.description: Shadow Word grants 20% movement speed bonus to allies and slows enemies by 20%.

scepter_effect.description: Causes Wild Axes to have no cooldown, and can be used again once they come back.

shard_effect.description: Hawks become controllable and gain Dive Bomb. Dive Bomb: Channels for 1 second, revealing itself, and then flying towards the target enemy, dealing damage and stunning them for 1 second, killing the hawk.

scepter_effect.description: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

shard_effect.description: Releases a sonic boom when Queen of Pain blinks, at both her starting and ending locations. Deals 150 damage in a 300 AoE and silences for 1.5 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

shard_effect.description: Causes Venomous Gale to summon two Plague Wards when it impacts an enemy hero. Increases travel range by 400.

scepter_effect.description: Applies a Time Lock proc to all units at the landing destination.

shard_effect.description: Increases Time Walk cast range by 200.

scepter_effect.description: If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed for 7 seconds. Buffs the transformed units with +75 attack speed and +25% movement speed.

shard_effect.description: Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost and spawn three skeletons to attack each nearby enemy hero when Reincarnation is triggered.

scepter_effect.description: Whenever an enemy is affected by your spells or when you attack an enemy, a ghost will fly out, slow and hit the enemy for bonus its usual damage then return to you with life.

shard_effect.description: Drains 0.75 armor per second and gives it to Death Prophet. Armor gain/loss lasts for 14 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Causes Blur to have instant cast time and applies a dispel. Anytime you get a hero kill, your abilities are refreshed. Reduces Blur cooldown and increases Fade Time to 0.75.
Removes cooldown and increases damage.

shard_effect.description: When cast on an enemy, causes  Life Drain to create new Life Drain links on other enemy heroes within cast range +200 for every 1.75 seconds spent channeling. The channeling only ends if there are no links up anymore, or the channel duration runs out.
Causes Psionic Trap to silence enemies for up to 3 seconds based on how long the trap has been charged. Increases max trap count by 4.

scepter_effect.description: Decreases mana cost and cooldown, and increases cast range.

shard_effect.description: Causes Poison Attack to lower armor by 1.5 per stack and increases max stacks by 3.

scepter_effect.description: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams and duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.

shard_effect.description: Allows Lucent Beam to be ground targeted with a target search radius. Also increases stun duration to 1.2 second and grants Luna +30% bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Increases the level of your ultimate. Adds a 4th level, Black Dragon. Black Dragon has bonus Corrosive Damage, Splash Damage, and Slow amount, free pathing and grants additional Magic resistance.
Increases Shadow Wave's heal, damage, and causes it to apply a basic dispel on allies

shard_effect.description: Causes Dazzle to launch an attack at the three closest enemies within 1200 range each time he casts an ability.

Causes Split Earth to repeat in the same location two additional times, with a 5 second delay between each one. Each time the radius increases by 75. Split Earth echo location is visible to both teams.

scepter_effect.description: Lowers cooldown from 85 to 60. Roots and Disarms all enemies it hits. Duration scales from 1.6 up to 3.4 seconds at max bounce.

shard_effect.description: Causes the first two trees destroyed with Sprout to summon Greater Treants. Can only have two Greater Treants alive.

scepter_effect.description: Allows Infesting enemy heroes for 4 seconds, attacking their inside once every 1.25 seconds and doubling Lifestealer's regen rate. Increases cast range to 500 and reduces cooldown to 25 seconds.
Replaces Ion Shell's cooldown with 2 charges that has a 9 second replenish time, grants 350 max health to allied targets, and increases its duration by 20.

shard_effect.description: Causes Skeleton Walk to create two Burning Army Skeletons.

scepter_effect.description: Increases duration, provides HP regen, radius becomes global and affects buildings.

shard_effect.description: Adds 3 permanent Nature's Attendants that follow Enchantress around.

scepter_effect.description: Forces the enemy target to attack you for 3 seconds and increases cast range by 300.

shard_effect.description: Causes Inner Fire to reduce healing and regeneration by 50% and applies a 40% movement speed slow. Lowers cooldown by 3 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Causes Void to be an AoE ability. Increases the ministun duration.

shard_effect.description: During night time, Night Stalker can cast Hunter in the Night. Consumes a lesser creature, instantly killing it and restoring 25% of Night Stalker's maximum HP and mana. Can only be cast on non-player units. Cooldown: 20

scepter_effect.description: Increases movement speed, removes movement speed limit, and increases Spin Web max count.
Applies Jinada to Shuriken Toss, reduces cooldown to 6 and increases cast range to 650.

shard_effect.description: Allies now gain 50% of Track Speed boost. Provides 600 vision around the target for Bounty Hunter's team.

scepter_effect.description: Reduces cooldown, and allows Weaver to cast Time Lapse on an ally.

shard_effect.description: Reduces cooldown by 4. Causes The Swarm to latch onto and reveal invisible units.

scepter_effect.description: Increases flame length, duration, and damage.
Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within range. The secondary target is tethered to the first.

shard_effect.description: Allows Flaming Lasso to be cast on an allied hero, granting them 80% damage reduction. Has 20 second cooldown when used on allies.

scepter_effect.description: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient Creeps, maximum one per level of Hand of God.

shard_effect.description: Allows Divine Favor to be cast on allies, teleporting them back home after 6 seconds. Cannot target spell immune allies. Cast Range: 500. Cooldown: 35
Can active Dispersion to spawn a Haunt Illusion to attack the most recent hero that damaged Spectre in the last 5s. Illusion lasts 5 seconds. Cooldown: 25

scepter_effect.description: Doom applies Break and reduces cooldown to 100.

shard_effect.description: Infernal Blade stun duration is increased from 0.6 to 1.2 seconds. If the enemy's level is a multiple of 3, or above level 24, they will be stunned for an additional 0.6 seconds and take 150 bonus damage.

scepter_effect.description: Removes cooldown of Chilling Touch

shard_effect.description: Causes Ice Vortex to deal 40 DPS and reduces attack speed by 20.

scepter_effect.description: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.

shard_effect.description: Every 6th Fury Swipes on a single target causes Ursa to get enraged for 1 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Increases Charge of Darkness movespeed by 175 and reduces cooldown to 7

shard_effect.description: Causes Nether Strike to deal 200 damage, and apply a 4-second break. Grants you Spell Immunity for 2 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units near Gyrocopter. Prioritizes furthest unit away within its range.

shard_effect.description: Rocket Barrage hits an extra target and increases duration by 1 second.

scepter_effect.description: Adds one level to the stats provided by Quas, Wex, and Exort on all Invoked spells.

shard_effect.description: Allows Ice Wall to be a Vector Target ability with 1100 cast range. Increases wall length by 320.

scepter_effect.description: Causes Last Word to become a 600 AoE ability.

shard_effect.description: Causes Glaives to bounce once towards the closest enemy unit, dealing 50% of Silencer's attack damage. Bounce range is 600.

scepter_effect.description: Grants 2 charges to Astral Imprisonment and increases cast range by 150.

shard_effect.description: Essence Flux becomes 1.5 second channel ability. Swaps Outworld Destroyer's current Life and Mana totals. Only transfers 75% of the respective values. Cooldown: 45

Causes one of the three lanes' creep waves to include a Lycan Wolf icon.png Lane Wolf, which behaves like the lane creeps that cannot be controlled by the player, and move at the same speed as they do. Requires Summon Wolves to be learned to work.

scepter_effect.description: Primal Split has 2 charges and can be canceled at any time. Charge replenish time is equal to the normal cooldown.

shard_effect.description: Primal Split now creates a Void brewling. Has Astral Pulse ability, affecting enemies in a 500 AoE. Applies 20%/30%/40% slow and disarm for 2.5 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Cooldown is removed, replaced with 3 charges that replenish every 60 seconds. Also causes Demonic Purge to break its target's passive abilities while active.

shard_effect.description: Allows Demonic Purge to be cast on allies, continuously dispelling them and healing for its damage values. Does not slow allies.

scepter_effect.description: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.

shard_effect.description: Savage Roar now empowers allies in 700 AoE with +20% Movement Speed and +60 Attack Speed for 5 seconds

scepter_effect.description: Creates an illusion of allied heroes. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.

shard_effect.description: Chaos Bolt creates a Phantasm illusion attacking the target for the duration of the stun. Increases cast range by 300.
Ransack now has a 30% chance on hit to apply a Geostrike debuff, slowing enemies by 20% and dealing 20 DPS for 4 seconds. Instances from multiple Meepos stack.

Causes Nature's Guise to root enemies upon attacking. Roots them for 1 second and deals a total of 200 damage. Lasts an extra second when attacking near a tree. Increases movement speed bonus by 15%%.

scepter_effect.description: Increases strength steal.

shard_effect.description: Increases Decay radius by 100 and spawns a zombie around each hero target.

scepter_effect.description: Decreases cooldown, increases cast range and upgrades the spell to the Scepter level.

shard_effect.description: Allows you to target yourself or allies with Telekinesis. Throw range is 60% longer and cooldown is reduced by 30% when targeting allies. Throw delay reduced to 0.5 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Mutes items.

shard_effect.description: Allows Thunder Strike to be cast on allies, follows the ally and deals damage around them. Each strike gives a short 1 second buff that provides +50% Movement Speed and +75 Attack Speed. Increases radius by 260 when used on allies.
Causes Nyx's Vendetta attack to reduce enemy magic resistance by 20% for 4 seconds. Also increases Vendetta movement speed by 25%, unlocking max speed.

scepter_effect.description: Allows Ensnare to target Spell Immune or sleeping units. Reduces the Ensnare cooldown by 5 seconds and increases cast range by 400

shard_effect.description: Adds active to Rip Tide, releasing stronger Rip Tide that slows enemies by 40% for 4 seconds. Applies around each illusion, but can be only hit by one instance. Increases the base armor reduction by 2.
Causes Illuminate to heal for 40% of its damage during daytime.

scepter_effect.description: Spirits now passively spawn around you constantly every second. Max of 5.

shard_effect.description: Ending Tether stuns enemies touching it for 1.75 seconds and deals 150 damage. Increases movement speed bonus by 10%.
Grants Visage the ability to cast Stone Form. Restores up to 25% of your health. Cooldown: 60. Manacost: 200.

scepter_effect.description: Provides 2 charges and increases pounce range to 1400.
Causes Mystic Snake to turn enemies hit into stone. Stone duration increases with each bounce of the Mystic Snake.

Reduces  Whirling Axes cooldown from 9 to 4 and mana cost by 50%. Causes  Whirling Axes (Ranged) to apply a basic dispel on hit enemies, and  Whirling Axes (Melee) to apply a basic dispel on self upon cast.

shard_effect.description: Casting Battle Trance now gives Troll Warlord a global aura that gives allied heroes (including himself) +60 Attack Speed.

scepter_effect.description: Heroes affected by Stampede take 40% reduced damage, and are able to run through obstructions, including trees and up cliffs.

shard_effect.description: Causes Double Edge to increase Centaur's strength by 15% per hero hit for 12 seconds. Duration refreshes per stack. Max 5 stacks. Slows enemies by 15% for 2 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Causes  Shockwave to release 3 waves, one going centered and the other 2 at 30° angles towards the left and right. After reaching max distance, the shockwaves return, dealing 75% damage and pulling enemies towards the returning point.
Viscous Nasal Goo becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range. Increases stack limit to 8.
When Skywrath Mage casts a spell, a different random target within 700 range willl be hit with the same ability. Heroes will take priority.

shard_effect.description: Ancient Seal debuff now causes other debuffs applied to last 50% longer. Grants vision over the target.

scepter_effect.description: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than 525 damage while within 1600 range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.

shard_effect.description: Causes Mist Coil and Aphotic Shield to apply a Curse of Avernus stack on enemies. Increases base slow by 10%.

scepter_effect.description: Causes you to become Spell Immune for 2 seconds per affected enemy hero when the spirit returns to you.

shard_effect.description: Allows you switch Echo Stomp to autocast. When cast while on autocast, Elder Titan will take place of the Astral Spirit as it completes its stomp.

scepter_effect.description: Increases Duel duration, makes Legion Commander Spell Immune in Duel, and makes Legion Commander and her opponent only take damage from each other.

shard_effect.description: While Dueling, immediately and every 2 seconds, an Overwhelming Odds is cast centered on a random enemy unit within 900 radius. Does not center on the same target twice. Prioritizes heroes.

scepter_effect.description: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges.

shard_effect.description: Fire Remnants deal 45 damage per second in a 600 AoE around them. If Ember Spirit dies or kills an enemy hero within 400 range, a Fire Remnant appears nearby.
Causes Stone Remnant to provide 400 ground vision. Increases charge count by 4.

scepter_effect.description: Reduces Dark Rift teleport delay by 1, and cooldown by 50, and allows it to be cast on allied heroes.

shard_effect.description: Firestorm can be self-targeted. When used that way, the Firestorm follows Underlord around. Also causes Firestorm to heal him for 15% of the damage values. Reduced cast point by half.

scepter_effect.description: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together.

shard_effect.description: Causes Fire Spirits to become a passive charge-based ability. Has a 7 second replenish time.

scepter_effect.description: Allows Minefield Sign to hide any Proximity Mines, Stasis Traps, and Remote Mines in an 125 radius area around the sign from True Sight. Increases cast range by 300.

shard_effect.description: Increases Blast Off! cast range by 600, and applies a 1.5 second stun to enemies in 200 AoE

scepter_effect.description: Causes  Fate's Edict to no longer grant 100% magic resistance to enemy targets and to no longer disarm allied targets.

shard_effect.description: Causes False Promise to have a 0.3-second fade delay invisibility.

scepter_effect.description: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining 20 mana every second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target. Increases Winter Wyvern's movement speed.

shard_effect.description: When Cold Embrace ends, a Splinter Blast goes off that location, hitting enemies within range.

scepter_effect.description: Causes  Spark Wraith to spawn a new wraith after impacting the enemy, which has an activation delay of 3 seconds. Spark Wraiths created this way cannot spawn further wraiths.

shard_effect.description: Magnetic Field now pushes enemies out of the area at cast time, and provides allies in it with +20% Magic Resistance.

scepter_effect.description: Spawns a monkey soldier near you at regular intervals. Soldiers do not spawn while invisible or on trees. Soldiers only attack buildings when Monkey King himself is nearby.

shard_effect.description: Reduces cooldown to 0.4 and cast point to 0.1.

scepter_effect.description: Attacking no longer takes you out of Shadow Realm. Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff.

shard_effect.description: Cursed Crown creates four brambles around the target after the counter ends. Triggers even upon dispel. Reduces cooldown by 3 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Causes Shield Crash to cast a 2-attack Swashbuckle in every 90 degrees around your hero.
Causes Resonant Pulse to silence for 2 seconds and gain two charges.

shard_effect.description: Adds a partial outer ring to Dissimilate. Increases damage by 125.
Causes Scatterblast to knock units back in the point blank range for 250 units, dealing 125 extra damage and stunning for 1.5 seconds.

scepter_effect.description: Causes  Bulwark to spawn 5 invulnerable soldiers in an arc 200 range in front of Mars that move along with him, and attack enemies in 1 second intervals within 150 in front of them, dealing Mars's attack damage +75, applying on-hit effects, and slowing enemy movement speed by 20% for 1 second. Each soldier may attack only one enemy at a time.

shard_effect.description: Spear of Mars impales up to two units and leaves a fire trail behind for 10 seconds. Deals 35 damage per second and slows by 20%. Debuff lingers for 2 seconds.
